column5: I'm going to Quebec in May and I am looking for a guide to take me and my wife Pike and Walleye fishing. No overnight trips but might go on a couple seperate day trips. This is in the Outaouais area (Aylmer, Hull, Gatineau) near Ottawa. Found a few on the internet but they only offer overnight trips. Need info. Any reccomendations ? Thanks. Mad Man.
